headline: Is It Time To Reassess NVR (NVR) After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether NVR at around US$7,507 per share is still a sensible entry or hold, it really comes down to what you think the business is worth versus the current price. The stock is up 3.1% year to date and 1.9% over the last year, although it has seen a 6.3% decline over the past week and a 1.0% decline over the past month, which may signal shifting views on its risk and return trade off. Recent news coverage has focused on NVR as a large US homebuilder, often highlighting...
